Texts.Chs: 把^orange;高级塑料^reset;带给这名科学家。 (位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Advanced Plastic^reset; to the scientist at the ^green;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 优秀，你应该要储存一些这种材料，因为你会发现它是不可或缺的。
Texts.Eng: Excellent! You'll need a lot of plastic, so keep well stocked.

If you're going to make it as a scientist, you are going to need ^orange;Advanced Plastic^reset;. Find some ^orange;Oil^reset; from a ^green;Desert^reset; or from ^orange;Bonemeal^reset; and then head to your ^orange;Bio Lab^reset;. Bring me back one single piece!
